Content.p:
This site is powered by the InformationKruncher's KrunchServer. The goal of this project is to design a service that meets the following criteria:
Built purely using international standards
Is extensible
Is fault tolerant, and secure
Works the same in every standard operating environment
Must be legible, and designed to accomadate the needs of any competent computer programmer.

p.div: All of the source code for the server can be found in the
